name: holesail-server-manager
description: A web server to manage a holesail-server instance

scripts.dev: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run watch:server" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:static"
scripts.watch:server: npm run ensure-dist && nodemon -w "src/*.js" -w ".env" --exec "npm run build:server && node dist/server.js"
scripts.watch:css: npm run ensure-dist && npm run build:css -- --watch
scripts.watch:static: npm run ensure-dist && nodemon -w "src/static/**/*" -e "*" --exec "npm run build:static"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:static && npm run build:css
scripts.build:server: npm run ensure-dist && cp src/server.js dist/server.js
scripts.build:static: npm run ensure-dist && mkdir -p dist/static && cp -r src/static/* dist/static && cp node_modules/qr-code-styling/lib/qr-code-styling.js dist/static/qr-code-styling.js && cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js dist/static/alpine.js
scripts.docker:build-to-registry: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 --progress plain --tag orenz0/holesail-server-manager:v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") . --output type=registry

author: orenz0@protonmail.com
